section.name: Warnings!
section.p: This is an experimental module for the Fedora Commons repository framework. Please, please don't use it on a production repository without very thorough testing. Misusing this component (particularly see here) could damage your Resource Index to the point where only a complete rebuild can restore order. Those of us with large repositories will shudder at the thought.

The triples you extract and add to the Resource Index using this module will not be visible or modifiable by the normal Fedora API methods and they will not appear in RELS-EXT or RELS-INT. You might think of them as being "orthogonal" to those explicitly-recorded relationships. They will only exist in the Resource Index and can only be used by services and workflows that use the RI.
